Description:
In today’s hybrid world, organizations are reimagining how and where work gets done. Enter **Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD)**—Microsoft’s flexible, secure, and scalable desktop virtualization service built on Azure. Whether you’re supporting remote workers, enabling BYOD policies, or running high-performance apps in the cloud, AVD has become a central player in the modern workplace strategy.
